entry.title: Posted by: Thunderbird integrara mensajeria instantanea
entry.content: […] (proyecto que sigue bastante activo, por lo que vemos en su blog actualizado por última vez hace apenas dos semanas) y por dentro utiliza librerías de Pidgin. Ya existe una build temprana descargable desde Bugzilla […]

entry.title: Posted by: clokep
entry.summary: Bug 1021 covers upgrading from the old libpurple plug-in to the new libqq one: https://bugzilla.instantbird.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1021 . The real issue is that we don’t support captchas (or much of the request API from libpurple), which we’ve heard makes QQ essentially unusable. If you …
entry.content:
Bug 1021 covers upgrading from the old libpurple plug-in to the new libqq one: https://bugzilla.instantbird.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1021 . The real issue is that we don’t support captchas (or much of the request API from libpurple), which we’ve heard makes QQ essentially unusable. If you’re interested in helping out, please stop by #instantbird on irc.mozilla.org or reply on the bug, etc.

I’m glad it’s working for you! We hadn’t really had any reports of it working (and have no way to test ourselves).

entry.title: Posted by: carlos
entry.content: please do not drop qq, i am using win 7 and debian 6, and i am using qq for my daily chat, so if i can do some help, and i will. But just tell me how to help!
